find:
<xf:editorrow name="message" value="{$post.message}"
				attachments="{$attachmentData.attachments}"
				rowtype="fullWidth noLabel"
				data-min-height="{{ $quickEdit ? 100 : '' }}"
				label="{{ phrase('message') }}"
				data-preview-url="{{ link('posts/preview', $post) }}" />
replace:
<xf:if is="$thread">	
<xf:if is="$thread.is_dropdown_active">
		<xf:selectrow
        name="message"
        label="{{ phrase('dropdownReply') }}"
      >
       		<xf:option value="{$post.message}">
		   {{snippet($post.message, 41, {'stripBbCode': true})}}
			</xf:option
          >
        <xf:foreach loop="$thread.dropdwon_options" value="$val">
			 <xf:if is="$val && $val!=$post.message">
			    <xf:option
				value="{$val}"
				>{{snippet($val, 41, {'stripBbCode': true})}}
				</xf:option>
			</xf:if>

        </xf:foreach>
      </xf:selectrow>
	
		<xf:else />
		$0
		
</xf:if>
	
<xf:else />
		$0
	</xf:if>
